name: King 2019
description:
King 2019
16.6.2019

Team: Online-Team
Event: EkoGameJam

Story:

You step in the shoes of the King-Mayor of the little city on the shore of the ocean of the Globwarm. You decide the fate of your beloved city and your goal is to survive on your throne for 50 years, doing your best to keep the global warming and rising ocean at bay, while keeping your citizens fed and happy. And alive.
The game takes it's inspiration from old city management games and uses real world data to simulate the environment and the threats global warming poses.

The game was made as part of the EkoGameJam witch focused on prototyping games that utilize environmental data.

Credits:

Aleksi Höh - Project management, Audio
Avarage Bear - Programming, UI
Jessica/missb3lla - Art
Rene - Programming, Logic
Killerrabit - Programming, Data

How to play:

You select actions in the left part of the screen.
You can see the effect directly, but it will take effect only after you press Apply.

Your goal is to keep CO2 amount low as possible. The rest is left for you to find out.
